entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Carberry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 a.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
